name: AndroidScreencast
tagline: View and control your android device on PC
body: AndroidScreencast - download latest ================= [![Build Status](https://drone.io/github.com/xSAVIKx/AndroidScreencast/status.png)](https://drone.io/github.com/xSAVIKx/AndroidScreencast/latest) AndroidScreencast - View and control your android device on PC. This project gives you opportunity to use your phone even with broken screen. Features: - No client needed - Support for Tap and Swipe gestures - Write messages using PC keyboard - Support for landscape mode - Browse your phone files on PC [Small wiki of project](https://github.com/xSAVIKx/AndroidScreencast/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
